Articles.Content:
hello fellow space cadettes,

now how do i earn those nifty mission badges?

Welcome mate.

About the badges, go see here to have them custom made for you: http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/

Of course, earning them is a different thing. Complete missions, achieve objectives. Career mode, to make the accomplishment that bit more serious.

To make things more rewarding, I also use a few mods to improve realism.

P.S. you're from Belgium? I lived 3 yrs in Mons (2003-2006), my soul has remained there since then.

thank you for answering diomedea, and yes i am from the land of beer fries and chocolate.

it's nice to hear someone comment in a good way about my country thank you verry kind of you.

now i must leave you cous i have to boldly go where no kerman has gone before!!!!
